alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 9:20PM EST until March 15 at 1:40PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford, at Williams, and near Rivervale. White River at Hazleton, Edwardsport, and Petersburg. .Minor flooding is ongoing across southern Indiana due to widespread 2 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is expected to end Saturday on the East Fork White River, although minor flooding is expected to persist on lower portions of the White River well into next week with additional rain expected tonight and again this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, In agricultural season, extensive flooding of bottomlands and some of the higher bottomlands is in progress. High water surrounds residents in river cabins. Oil fields and local roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
